Question: This person was one of the few Conservative MPs to support Leo Abse's Bill to decriminalise male homosexuality.
Hints: In the Falklands, this person Day has been marked every 10 January since 1992, commemorating her visit in 1983.
This person was not a candidate in the 1955 general election as it came fairly soon after the birth of her children.
The policy of privatisation has been called "a crucial ingredient of this personism".
